price: Nokorε, sε Ɔpεsε Ɔyε biribi a, N’ahyεdeε ara ne sε Ɔbεka sε: “ Yε!” Na ayε.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shayan an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
